features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against creatures within 5 ft. of any ally that is not incapacitated.

features.name: Bite
features.description: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.

features.name: Inspire Ferocity
features.description: Utility: range 30 ft., two friendly creatures. Effect: the creature inflicts an additional 3 damage until the start of your next turn.

features.name: Deep Bite
features.description: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage and ongoing 5 bleeding damage (save ends, DC 10 CON).
